revised_title: Identification of Chitin through Physical Constants
tldr: The authors describe a method to identify chitin by measuring its specific gravity and refractive index. They found that chitin from various sources had specific gravities ranging from 1.393 to 1.408 and refractive indices between 1.550 and 1.557. This method helps in determining the presence of chitin in different organisms and understanding its chemical composition.
